trans-unit.source: You have walked a long and lonely road, leaving your home and your life behind. You might have committed a heinous crime, something so awful that your people forced you out, and if you dare return, you face death. You might have been accused of a crime you didn’t commit and now must pay the price for someone else’s wicked deed. Your exile might be the result of a social gaffe—perhaps you shamed your family or a friend, or you embarrassed yourself in front of your peers, an authority, or someone you respect. Whatever the reason, you have left your old life behind and now strive to make a new one.
trans-unit.target: You have walked a long and lonely road, leaving your home and your life behind. You might have committed a heinous crime, something so awful that your people forced you out, and if you dare return, you face death. You might have been accused of a crime you didn’t commit and now must pay the price for someone else’s wicked deed. Your exile might be the result of a social gaffe—perhaps you shamed your family or a friend, or you embarrassed yourself in front of your peers, an authority, or someone you respect. Whatever the reason, you have left your old life behind and now strive to make a new one.

trans-unit.source: Loner: You gain no benefit when you get help with a task from another character who is trained or specialized in that task.
trans-unit.target: Loner: You gain no benefit when you get help with a task from another character who is trained or specialized in that task.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all tasks involving sneaking.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all tasks involving sneaking.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all tasks involving foraging, hunting, and finding safe places to rest or hide.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all tasks involving foraging, hunting, and finding safe places to rest or hide.

trans-unit.source: Inability: Living on your own for as long as you have makes you slow to trust others and awkward in social situations. Any task involving social interaction is hindered.
trans-unit.target: Inability: Living on your own for as long as you have makes you slow to trust others and awkward in social situations. Any task involving social interaction is hindered.

trans-unit.source: Additional Equipment: You have a memento from your past—an old picture, a locket with a few strands of hair inside, or a lighter given to you by someone important. You keep the object close at hand and pull it out to help you remember better times.
trans-unit.target: Additional Equipment: You have a memento from your past—an old picture, a locket with a few strands of hair inside, or a lighter given to you by someone important. You keep the object close at hand and pull it out to help you remember better times.

trans-unit.source: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.
trans-unit.target: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

trans-unit.source: The other PCs earned your trust by helping you when you needed it. You accompany them to repay them.
trans-unit.target: The other PCs earned your trust by helping you when you needed it. You accompany them to repay them.

trans-unit.source: While exploring on your own, you discovered something strange. When you traveled to a settlement, the PCs were the only ones who believed you, and they have accompanied you to help you deal with the problem.
trans-unit.target: While exploring on your own, you discovered something strange. When you traveled to a settlement, the PCs were the only ones who believed you, and they have accompanied you to help you deal with the problem.

trans-unit.source: One of the other PCs reminds you of someone you used to know.
trans-unit.target: One of the other PCs reminds you of someone you used to know.

trans-unit.source: You have grown weary of your isolation. Joining the other PCs gives you a chance to belong.
trans-unit.target: You have grown weary of your isolation. Joining the other PCs gives you a chance to belong.
